item.title: How To Be An Antiracist
item.description: In light of recent events, we’re switched books from Simon Sinek’s Inifite Game to Ibram X. Kendi’s How To Be An Antiracist. Through our own discussions we realized that we have a lot to learn. The author has been kind enough to create and share some book club resources that you can find on his site. Check out our Book Club page for more info.

item.title: Book club
item.description: Photo by Isaac Smith on Unsplash We meet weekly to discuss whatever book we’re reading. Current book: How To Be An Antiracist Things we need to answer for future get-togethers How do we meet? What book should we talk about next? Where do we chat about things?

item.title: What does Cultivating Curiosity mean?
item.description: Cultivating Curiosity is our attempt at spreading a new mindset. Don’t push back or be afraid, instead be curious. Photo by Shelby Cohron on Unsplash
